statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); username=$(whoami); hostname=$(hostname -s); git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then git_dir=$(git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir 2>/dev/null); wt_info=""; if echo "$git_dir" | grep -q '/\.git/worktrees/'; then wt_name=$(echo "$git_dir" | sed 's|.*/\.git/worktrees/||'); wt_info=" $(printf '\033[33m[wt:%s]\033[0m' "$wt_name")"; fi; branch=$(git -C "$cwd" symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then status=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); ind=""; echo "$status" | grep -q "^??" && ind="${ind} ?"; echo "$status" | grep -q "^ M\|^M " && ind="${ind} ✱"; echo "$status" | grep -q "^A " && ind="${ind} ✚"; echo "$status" | grep -q "^D \| D" && ind="${ind} ✖"; echo "$status" | grep -q "^R " && ind="${ind} →"; git_info=" :$(printf '\033[32m%s\033[0m' "$branch")${ind}"; fi; git_info="${wt_info}${git_info}"; fi; node_info=""; if command -v node > /dev/null 2>&1; then nv=$(node -v 2>/dev/null | sed 's/v//'); [ -n "$nv" ] && node_info=" node:$(printf '\033[32m%s\033[0m' "$nv")"; fi; ctx_pct=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // 0' | awk '{printf "%.0f", $1}'); ctx_info=""; [ "$ctx_pct" != "0" ] && ctx_info=" $(printf '\033[35mctx:%s%%\033[0m' "$ctx_pct")"; printf '\033[32m[\033[33m%s\033[32m@\033[34m%s\033[32m: \033[31m%s\033[0m%s\033[32m]\033[36m%s%s\033[0m' "$username" "$hostname" "$cwd" "$git_info" "$node_info" "$ctx_info"
